name: Pock's adventure
description:
All of the hens have lost their eggs. Pock the flabby chicken is tasked with retrieving them. Find the eggs and save the chicks!

Pock's adventure is a 2D sidescrolling platformer. However, Pock can only jump once on every screen. Be mindful of when you jump!

Controls:

  • a,d or arrow keys: Move left and right
  • w or space: jump
  • r: reset
